actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase, over a 3-year period, the corporate surtax exemption from $25,000 to $100,000.

summary.text: Increases over a 3-year period, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, the corporate surtax exemption from $25,000 to $100,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase, over a 3-year period, the corporate surtax exemption from $25,000 to $100,000.
